thread.section_title: 8Seasons 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 8Seasons 的点评意见 | 8seasons.com
thread.title: Sheila Schetrompf

author: Sheila Schetrompf
title: Sheila Schetrompf
text: I am so happy I discovered 8Seasons! I have ordered so many great things, you can't beat the variety of products and prices are excellent!! Merchandise is well packed and shipping is fast, usually within 24 hours! And the customer service is phenomenal!!! Fast, polite, friendly communication that makes me feel like my business is important to them, no matter the size of my order! I can't say enough about this wonderful company and highly recommend to anyone! Thank you 8Seasons!
